info.title: Positivity API Gateway
info.description:
Unified API Gateway for all POS microservices.

**API Versioning**: All requests must include the `X-API-Version` header.

**Available Routes**:
- `/accounting/**` - General ledger, journal entries, financial operations
- `/catalog/**` - Product information, categorization, details
- `/customer/**` - Customer profiles, preferences, history
- `/event-receiver/**` - Event ingestion and processing
- `/image/**` - Image storage, retrieval, transformation
- `/inquiry/**` - Customer inquiries and support tracking
- `/inventory/**` - Stock management and availability
- `/invoice/**` - Invoice generation, tracking, management
- `/location/**` - Store locations, warehouses, branches
- `/order/**` - Order creation, fulfillment, tracking
- `/people/**` - Employee management, staff administration
- `/price/**` - Pricing rules, discounts, cost calculations
- `/security-service/**` - Authentication, authorization, access control
- `/shop-manager/**` - Shop operations, scheduling, resources
- `/vehicle-fitment/**` - Vehicle compatibility, parts installation
- `/vehicle-inventory/**` - Vehicle stock and availability
- `/workorder/**` - Service requests, job tracking, assignments

**Example**: `curl -H "X-API-Version: 1" http://localhost:8080/inventory/items`
